response.answer_text: Yeah it’s pretty close … close enough to pass as 5′9″, or at least according to me. If you were to grow 1 more centimeter then that would make you 175 cm which is just a smidge under 5′9″ … 175.26 centimeters is 5′9″ so you'd have to grow another 1.26 centimeters to reach 5′9″. However, if you are 16 years old and you are a girl then you most likely have stopped growing. So yeah, your height now is most likely you final adult height. But to get back to the point, yes, 5′8 1/2″ (174 cm) is pretty close to 5′9″ (175.26 cm).

5′8.5″/174cm is 1 cm and half an inch away from 5′9″ (175cm) and visually unnoticeable between from 5′8.5″ to about 99% of all people. Both would be rather short for adult males, but are somewhat kind-of tall for females. You said you are a 16 year old girl, so you are considered somewhat tall (though unlikely to grow much more at your current age). Congrats!
